#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
	int t,i,ctr;
	char s[11],a[10][6]={"-----",".----","..---","...--","....-",".....","-....","--...","---..","----."};
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%s",s);
		ctr=0;
		for (i=0;s[i];i++)
		{
			printf("%s",a[s[i]-48]);
			ctr+=(s[i]-48)<5?(s[i]-48):(58-s[i]);
		}
		printf("\n%d\n",ctr);
	}
	return 0;
}
